intent_atoms.description: The shared aggregation store, metrics, and tests must be consistent across ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and SwiftUI scaffolding.
Extend the tolerant parsing event stream to include severity, offset, and reason metadata for downstream UI and CLI surfacing.
The extended event stream must provide severity, offset, and reason metadata that unblocks downstream UI and CLI work.
VoiceOver regression tests must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Schedule and perform macOS and i‑pad iOS hardware verification for VoiceOver regression pass.
Hardware verification should be completed with reference to the documented task archive.

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore Aggregation
functional_units.description: Aggregates shared issue store data, metrics, and tests across ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and SwiftUI scaffolding.

functional_units.name: Issue Metrics Presentation
functional_units.description: Extends tolerant parsing event stream with severity, offset, and reason metadata for UI and CLI surfacing.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verifies VoiceOver focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Integration
functional_units.description: Secures Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads.
